document_data.name: Towers of Fury
document_data.mainbody: The '''Towers of Fury''' was a temple complex in [[Calimport]] dedicated to the worship of the [[Gods of Fury]].
document_data.Location: The Towers of Fury was located in the the eastern half of [[Samilar Drudach]], part of [[Evyrtaan Sabban]] of [[Faiths Ward]], in Calimport.
document_data.Structure: The Towers of Fury consisted of four towers, each five-stories tall. The complex was surrounded by the wall that shared sides with the ''[[drudach]]'' walls.
document_data.History: The Towers of Fury was constructed in the {{YearlinkName|1356}}, by [[Syl-Pasha]] [[Rashid el Djenispool]] after centuries of previous temples being destroyed by the irritation of either gods or mortals.
